Title: Verify Sprint Burndown Gadget Board Selection
Description:
Ensure that the user can select a board from the dropdown in the Sprint Burndown Gadget and the gadget updates accordingly.
This test case covers the board selection functionality and its impact on the displayed data.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and has access to the dashboard with the Sprint Burndown Gadget.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard containing the Sprint Burndown Gadget.
2. Click on the board dropdown in the gadget.
3. Select a different board from the list.
4. Click the 'Save' button.
Expected Result: The Sprint Burndown Gadget updates to display data for the selected board.

Title: Verify Refresh Interval Setting in Sprint Burndown Gadget
Description: Ensure that the user can set the refresh interval for the Sprint Burndown Gadget and the gadget refreshes data at the selected interval.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and has access to the dashboard with the Sprint Burndown Gadget.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard containing the Sprint Burndown Gadget.
2. Click on the refresh interval dropdown.
3. Select a different interval (e.g., Every 5 Minutes).
4. Click the 'Save' button.
5. Wait for the selected interval to pass.
Expected Result: The Sprint Burndown Gadget refreshes its data at the newly selected interval.

Title: Verify Issue Assignment Display in 'Assigned to Me' Panel
Description: Ensure that issues assigned to the logged-in user are displayed correctly in the 'Assigned to Me' panel.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and has at least one issue assigned.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard.
2. Locate the 'Assigned to Me' panel.
3. Verify that the panel lists all issues assigned to the user.
Expected Result: All issues assigned to the user are displayed in the 'Assigned to Me' panel with correct details.

Title: Verify Activity Streams Panel Displays Recent Activity
Description: Ensure that the Activity Streams panel displays recent activity in Jira when available.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and there is recent activity in the system.
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to the dashboard.
2. Locate the Activity Streams panel.
3. Verify that recent activity is listed in the panel.
Expected Result: Recent activity is displayed in the Activity Streams panel. If no activity is present, an appropriate message is shown.

Title: Verify Gadget Search and Add Functionality
Description: Ensure that the user can search for a gadget using the search bar and add it to the dashboard.
Preconditions: User is logged into Jira and is on the dashboard page.
Test Steps:
1. Click on 'Add a Gadget'.
2. Enter a search term (e.g., 'Burn') in the search bar.
3. Locate the desired gadget in the search results.
4. Click the 'Add' button next to the gadget.
Expected Result: The selected gadget is added to the dashboard and is visible to the user.
